meanings.definition: The act or process of constructing with timber.
meanings.sent1: The timbering of the new house was done carefully to ensure stability.
meanings.sent2: The timbering for the bridge was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The timbering of the treehouse made the squirrels jealous of the human engineering skills.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the timbering of the cabin, filling it with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The timbering of the ship creaked softly as it sailed through the calm waters.

meanings.definition: The materials used in constructing with timber.
meanings.sent1: The high-quality timbering used in the furniture gave it a rich, natural look.
meanings.sent2: The timbering for the house was sourced sustainably from the nearby forest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous beavers stole some timbering from the construction site to build their dam.
meanings.sent4: The artist skillfully arranged the timbering to create a stunning sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh timbering filled the workshop, inspiring the carpenters to create beautiful pieces.
